parameters.name: sourceDictionaries
parameters.description: If 'all' is received, results are returned from all sources. If multiple values are received (e.g. 'century,wiktionary'), results are returned from the first specified dictionary that has definitions. If left blank, results are returned from the first dictionary that has definitions. By default, dictionaries are searched in this order: ahd, wiktionary, webster, century, wordnet
